attributes.action: Change the Logo of the 2012 games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new London 2012 logo is meangingless and uninspiring. It will only lead to greater cynicism about the entire enterprise of holding the Olympics in the first place. Instead of this 'new rave' logo we call on the Prime Minister to repeal the logo as it stands and instead allow the children of the UK to design a new logo in a competition between all schools, to not only inspire them, but also show the world what the UK can achieve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
